fields.headline: Welcome to Freesat
fields.bodyText: Forget about Freeview! For a one-off payment of just £150, you can receive a free Sky satellite dish and set-top decoder box, plus over 200 free channels, including: BBC1, BBC2, ITV, C4 and C5. Now safe on satellite. Never worry about your aerial falling off the roof again! AquariumTV Live. Just like Big Brother, only with fish. The Subscription Channel. Thinking about signing up for some of Sky's excellent subscription services? Here's all you need to know! ShopItUp. 24-hour shopping channel. ShoppityShop. Children's shopping channel. SkyTemperature. Find out how hot it is before you go outside. ATV. Like MTV, but for adverts. The Abi Titmuss Network. An eclectic mix of chat, shopping, ads and toplessness, presented by the queen of daytime free-to-air satellite TV. Txt yrself tv. Groundbreaking technology lets you send a text to your TV. TopDeckTV. The same great programming you get on the number 23 bus, in the comfort of your sitting room. Al Jazeera Style. New fashion and entertainment channel from a name you can trust. Shopaholics Anonymous. Shopping for people who really can't stop shopping. The Wallpaper* Channel. Your television has never looked lovelier. GoSport. Exclusive sports channel. Home of celebrity draughts, live fishing, night curling, county French cricket and the European What's the Time, Mr Wolf? championships. Not to be confused with Gosport TV, the live webcam trained on Gosport High Street, which is a subscription service. Planet Shop. The shoppingest shopping channel in the Shopiverse (formerly ShopYourAssOff TV). M*A*S*H Français. Back to back episodes of M*A*S*H, dubbed into French, but no less funny for it. Parliament Classic. Great debates from the good old government days. The Drinking Game Network. Repeats of old ITV dramas are hilarious when you play by the rules: just drink when the flashing pint appears in the screen's upper right-hand corner. CNNFlashback. Another chance to catch yesterday's headlines.
